comments.body: Do we have an integration test to verify this?

@mikewiebe none of the tasks in integration tests for this target actually assert the commands sent. However, I noticed this issue when https://github.com/ansible/ansible/blob/devel/test/integration/targets/nxos_bgp_neighbor/tests/common/sanity.yaml#L221 failed locally.

So we hit this in one of our periodic jobs too. [This](https://object-storage-ca-ymq-1.vexxhost.net/v1/a0b4156a37f9453eb4ec7db5422272df/ansible_14/63014/4fd9e871999fc13b776696b05eee0c2279fb4f85/third-party-check/ansible-test-network-integration-nxos-cli-python36/35942ee/controller/ara-report/result/e304c457-2280-4a1c-bc78-d6c38d3b9a85/) is the link.
I ran this PR against multiple platforms and image versions and the results look good.
